{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

  Select the incorrect statement about casparian strips .                               

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

These are bands of thickenings along the radial and tangential walls of endodermal cells

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:992"},{"text":"

They allow plasmolysis of endodermal cells

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:993"},{"text":"

These are composed of lignin and suberin.         

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1003"},{"text":"

It prevents movement of substance between cortex and pericycle

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1008"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"questionMaxScore":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"11BU9Q3 Select the incorrect statement about casparian strips .","title":"Copy of - 11BU9Q3 Select the incorrect statement about casparian strips .","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","gradeLevel":["Class 9"],"qlevel":"DIFFICULT","medium":"English","subject":"Science","max_score":1,"category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}
